content:
Does anyone have a sample Measure Resource for quality metrics, specifically for cervical cancer screening?
Something like this: http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/measure-cms146-example.html

I would also be interested in samples for breast cancer screening, colon cancer screening, controlling high blood pressure, and diabetes management.

Including @Anna Liu on this, as she is working on this for our company. Would be helpful to see some examples.

There are samples for all of those here:
https://github.com/cqframework/ecqm-content-r4/tree/master/input/resources/measure
